#summary What's coming in future releases

==Mid-August 2007==

*Highlights:*

  * Cross-origin API support ([http://code.google.com/p/google-gears/issues/detail?id=150 tracking bug], [CrossOriginAPI design doc])

  * !WorkerPool improvements:
    * Add HTTP requests ([http://code.google.com/p/google-gears/issues/detail?id=79 tracking bug])
    * Add timers ([http://code.google.com/p/google-gears/issues/detail?id=80 tracking bug])
    * Improve error reporting  ([http://code.google.com/p/google-gears/issues/detail?id=33&can=2&q=onerror tracking bug], [http://code.google.com/p/google-gears/wiki/NewWorkerPoolFeatures design doc])

For all changes in this release, see [http://code.google.com/p/google-gears/issues/list?q=milestone%3AM1 this query].


==Late September 2007==

*Highlights:*

  * i18n for Gears UI ([http://code.google.com/p/google-gears/issues/detail?id=138 tracking bug])

  * i18n for Database full-text-search ([http://code.google.com/p/google-gears/issues/detail?id=153 tracking bug])

  * Improved full-text-search scalability (FTS3) ([http://code.google.com/p/google-gears/issues/detail?id=137 tracking bug])

For all changes in this release, see [http://code.google.com/p/google-gears/issues/list?q=milestone%3AM2 this query].
